author: bodewig
msg: Make <property> inside <sequential> have an effect on later tasks in
The problem here has been, that Sequential#maybeConfigure would
configure all tasks before the first one has been executed.  A similar
change is probably needed for all TaskContainer's with a contract

author: bodewig
msg: Degrade "Overwriting task definition" message to VERBOSE if the old
and new task class are really the same but just have been loaded via
different classloader instances that used the same classpath.
